title: where is the 7 runes pages packs
body:
i was hoping to use the 2 for 1 deal this weekend on rune pages but its not in the store..

Anyone know what's happening there???

replies.body: used to be able to do it

you can buy the 2 for 1 page in the bundles tab. If you want 7 rune pages buy 4 of the bundles and get 8.

7 rune page bundle is 2600 RP
4 x 2 rune page bundle is 2360RP (8 pages)

What I think you were hinting at though, is trying to buy the 7 page bundle and get 14 pages correct? LMAO
If you think Riot are dumb enough to sell you 14 rune pages for 2600RP, think again LOL You can't buy the 7 page bundle and expect it to also be 2 for 1.
